title: Role Reversal
description: [Full This is a short story of around 3,800 words. Though it is centered around two characters from the Paul Mallory thriller series, Mallory himself does not appear here.]When Felicity Carter starts having recurring nightmares—nightmares that she cannot recall upon awakening—her roommate and best friend Maria Rakosi takes her to a hypnotist in a desperate attempt to get to the heart of the matter.She succeeds; but it's not the answer she was expecting...
author: Stephen C. Spencer
